clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fatigue.
findings: Collapse of right lower lobe lobe with volume loss.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in right lower lobe.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in right lower lobe.
Well-defined nodule measuring 23 mm in right lower lobe.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
